page.title: 12PRESERVATION ORDERS
page.content: Roud has a preservation order placed upon it by the Isle of Wight County Council.Most of the farms in Roud are owned by this council,but are still run by private families.The sewage works in Roud are owned by the I.W.C.C,jointly with the Southern Water Authority. St. Catherine's Down is owned by the National Trust.Other places of interest owned by the Trust are Hoy's Monument;a tumulus on St.Catherine's Down and the Hermitage, an old manor. This area is mainly farmland and National Trust land.
